descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a really epic Khajit follower in Nightingale Armor and is a level 30. Has the most advanced fighting system in the game.  Uses Magic and a custom enchanted sword I made. Will post sword by itself by request.  Follower is 3 times the size of normal Khajit and is essential.

Location: Inside Whiterun Stables

Known Bugs: May start off in Whiterun Guard Armor.
FIX: Just ask to trade items and then take away the Guard armor and Nightingale will appear. 

Leave any questions in the comments.
author: ohto45
